title: Goldman Upgrades Forecast for 2026 China Current-Account Surplus
description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. revised its forecast for China’s current-account surplus this year after incorporating data for the fourth quarter, when the measure of trade in goods and services rose to a record.
content: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. revised its forecast for China’s current-account surplus this year after incorporating data for the fourth quarter, when the measure of trade in goods and services rose to a record.
